Articles.Content:
One is for Tang, and the other contains various condiments to go with bacon.

I'm not sure that's.... does bacon NEED condiments? I suppose a BLT should have mayonnaise but bacon itself is the perfect food..... sounds kinda sacrilegious...

I agree, Bacon is all at once, food, condiment, and topping - how else could be have Bacon wrapped Bacon smothered in Bacon?

Oh, and HOORAY PARACHUTES!
Anyone know how to fix the Stack Chute's bottom node clipping into what's attached underneath? I know how to edit the configs to mess with node placement, but it seems to vary based on what size.

I can't resize the RealChute Coneshute neither RealChute Radial Shute to a smaller size

Note I have Tweakscale pproperly installed and it works with other parts without this problem

Edited March 28, 2015 by FreeThinker
Why would you try tweakscaling parts that are already of procedural size? Open the action groups, select a RC parachute and tweak properly

Why would you try tweakscaling parts that are already of procedural size? Open the action groups, select a RC parachute and tweak properly

Or if you don't have action groups unlocked yet right click the part and rescale it that way.

Anyone know how to fix the Stack Chute's bottom node clipping into what's attached underneath? I know how to edit the configs to mess with node placement, but it seems to vary based on what size.

It's intended.

Let the hype begin

I came to dream about a Wenkel/Vanguard partnership... Quite pleased. Much hype!

..and I just finished my breakfast sandwich containing a bacon weave so... I know bacon'chute is realistic!

It's probably been addressed a million times before, but is there any way to enable the mod to work with 64-bit windows?

I realize KSP on 64-bit windows is unstable, but KSP on 32-bit windows is unplayable for me. KSP/Unity leaks memory until the process eats over 3.5 gb of memory, then crashes, which usually happens after visiting the VAB just 2 or 3 times.

I promise to not bug you with bug reports if it bugs out afterwards, eheh...

Sorry to double post! (first post landed in a moderation queue)

I found this thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84203-Less-memory-usage-by-using-OpenGL

And switching to OpenGL cut the memory usage in half. So no more crashing for me! (and thank goodness, I was not looking forward to compiling C#.)

It's probably been addressed a million times before, but is there any way to enable the mod to work with 64-bit windows?

I realize KSP on 64-bit windows is unstable, but KSP on 32-bit windows is unplayable for me. KSP/Unity leaks memory until the process eats over 3.5 gb of memory, then crashes, which usually happens after visiting the VAB just 2 or 3 times.

I promise to not bug you with bug reports if it bugs out afterwards, eheh...

Sorry to double post! (first post landed in a moderation queue)

I found this thread http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84203-Less-memory-usage-by-using-OpenGL

And switching to OpenGL cut the memory usage in half. So no more crashing for me! (and thank goodness, I was not looking forward to compiling C#.)

Good, cause you would have had to recompile the mod for yourself.
Wait ! Do you Mean the mod will not work for ksp 64 bit build ? or the windows build ?
Will not work when running the 64-bit KSP executable in any Windows environment (type of windows install is irrelevant). Linux is unaffected

Wait ! Do you Mean the mod will not work for ksp 64 bit build ? or the windows build ?

The RealChute plugin is designed to disable itself if run on a KSP 64-bit Windows build.

However, the plugin will work fine on a KSP 32-bit Windows build, even if the Windows OS itself is 64-bit.
This will not work on KSP Windows x64. It will work on KSP Windows 32bit on both 32 and 64bit systems, and it will work on Linux in both KSP Linux 32bit and KSP Linux 64bit, and it will work on OSX.

Following last year's prank, my poor Jeb would not dare try one of those snacks...

Oh, it is going to be a good day... No a GREAT day...

A GREAT BACON kind of day......

with optimized toastiness to boot.........

It just does not get any better...
Bacon!! Thanks stupid_chris!! This made my day!!
I much prefer bacon to the parachutes acting as rockets, remember folks downloading things on 4/1 is always a hit or miss event
It's not about bacon, it's about ethics in mod development.
Was trying RSS for the first time in a while, and I stumbled upon BACONCHUTES!
I'd prefer bananas.

Sweet!!!!!
